participant_abstract.sent: This meeting fleshed out our exact design goals for this project, stating precisely what controls and functions are to be incorporated into the final design.
We also considered the market for the device.

participant_actions.sent: Flesh out the design in more detail - in my case, work out the shape of the remote and control layout

participant_decisions.sent: We decided against voice control, on technical grounds.

We decided to aim both for the popular market and licensing to TV manufacturers.
